findings.Description: Lambda functions should be configured with a dead-letter queue for failed invocations.
Types: Software and Configuration Checks/Industry and Regulatory Standards/AWS-Foundational-Security-Best-Practices
findings.Title: Lambda function is not configured with a dead-letter queue

findings.Description: VPC Flow Logs show 15,000+ rejected connection attempts to port 22 from multiple source IPs, indicating potential SSH brute force attack.
findings.Title: High volume of rejected connection attempts
